snippet: The State Department hearing drew hours of emotional testimony, mostly from opponents of Keystone XL, who whooped and applauded when anyone from their ranks spoke.
abstract: Hundreds of people stream into central Nebraska town Grand Island to attend State Department public hearing on Keystone XL pipeline; hearing, which may be last on project, draws hours of emotional testimony, mostly from opponents of pipeline.
lead_paragraph: The State Department hearing drew hours of emotional testimony, mostly from opponents of Keystone XL, who whooped and applauded when anyone from their ranks spoke.

headline.seo: Foes of Keystone Pipeline Sound Off In Nebraska
headline.main: Keystone Pipeline Foes Vent in Nebraska
headline.print_headline: Keystone Pipeline Foes Vent in Nebraska

keywords.value: Laborers International Union of North America
keywords.name: organizations
